mage yaluwekuta tika dawasaka idan ude nagitiddi kalanthe enawa.karakilla wage kiyanawa.oluwe kakkumak nalu.wi.pi. kenek chanal karama kiyala thiyenne kane kuhara wala lawana sandrana wenaswima eekata hethuwa kiyala beheth bila hari giya.mata danaganna one ehema wenne ayi kiyala.puluwan nam pahadili karala denna sthuthiyi.

eeta pilithuru dena hitapu janapathiwaraya meya sadharana nowana thinduwak bawath 1999 di banku ginum athhituwima magin thama ho thama pawule aya wasiyak nolabu bawath kiya thibe.aarthika awulwalata muhuna dena wenath oonama rajayak sidukarana aakarayen thamada katayuthu kala bawa kiyana ohu hadisi nithiya pita dama anek ratawala janapathiwarunta nam thamata men danduwam panawa nathi bawath kiyayi. 1999 di rate aarthika awapathayak hethuwen banku rasak wasa damunu athara hitapu janapathiwaraya adala thiranaya gaththe ewitaya.
